sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
slams a door or window
ali kadar vrata ali okno
slams
, jih nekdo s treskom zapre ali pa se sama tako zaprejo.

seg.quote: She went out, slamming the door behind her.
I waited for the gate behind me to slam shut.

sense.def:
To slam something down
pomeni nekaj naglo in z veliko močjo nekam položiti.

seg.quote: He slammed the money on the table.
